an5.137:1.1: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, appaṃ rattiyā supanti, bahuṃ jagganti.
an5.137:1.3: Itthī, bhikkhave, purisādhippāyā appaṃ rattiyā supati, bahuṃ jaggati.
an5.137:1.4: Puriso, bhikkhave, itthādhippāyo appaṃ rattiyā supati, bahuṃ jaggati.
an5.137:1.5: Coro, bhikkhave, ādānādhippāyo appaṃ rattiyā supati, bahuṃ jaggati.
an5.137:1.6: Rājā, bhikkhave, rājakaraṇīyesu yutto appaṃ rattiyā supati, bahuṃ jaggati.
an5.137:1.7: Bhikkhu, bhikkhave, visaṃyogādhippāyo appaṃ rattiyā supati, bahuṃ jaggati.
an5.137:1.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca appaṃ rattiyā supanti, bahuṃ jaggantī”ti.
